short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redacts personal information from your ChatGPT prompts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You don't want your personal data (think name, API keys, address, email) being shared with AI providers. AI Eraser is a free, secure, and local extension that embeds into ChatGPT.com. Just click the Redact button to redact some personal info from your messages/prompts.

Note: redaction technology is not fully accurate. You should review edits before sending to ChatGPT. The Internet Integrity Initiative is not responsible for any errors.
